--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:

> OOC:  Are you talking about the base or velley mine pentatron?  Cause
> you're not likely to get into the base.  Why are they here again?

> >
> > OOC: Is there anything we should know about the Bushido base before
> > entering???

Actually most of the team is in the dry river bed somewhere on the
outskirts of the mine some distance away as I said in the post. I have
Nightrazor much further in, but NOT IN THE BASE. I have stopped here
and have him looking around because I need some sort of description of
what is going on. I have not quite specified where he is because if the
player who runs this city talks about armed guards I can flow with the
change. At the moment I imagine him either inside the mine area or
atleast near the entrance, but that is open depending on what the
player shows. It looks as if Kratos (Airly) controls it all, and I was
waiting for a description or response from them.

 As far as I can tell the base is somewhere in the city ... and wasn't
the Bushido base the last place our runaway Minion was seen? Since
Unicron hasn't mentioned any updated knowledge then these guys have to
start here. 

If I am wrong in this, please let me know.

Thanks

Preston
